set_aws_accountid
=========
This role sets the aws account ID based on AWS KEY ID

Configure
------------

None

Role Variables
--------------

saaid_retval_accountid: The account ID that is returned

Dependencies
------------

None

Example Playbook
----------------

  - role: tools_roles/set_aws_accountid

License
-------

ASL 2.0

Author Information
------------------
